mapper.select: SELECT ba.BAN_NO AS "banNo", u.NAME AS "name", b.BOOK_TITLE AS "bookTitle", TO_CHAR(l.loan_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "loanDate", TO_CHAR(l.RETURN_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "returnDate", TO_CHAR(ba.BAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "banDate", ba.BAN_DAYS AS "banDays", TO_CHAR(ba.RELEASE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "releaseDate", ba.POLICY_NO AS "policyNo", ba.LOAN_NO AS "loanNo", ba.USER_NO AS "userNo", ba.BAN_NOTE AS "banNote" FROM BAN_USERS ba JOIN USERS u ON ba.USER_NO=u.USER_NO JOIN BOOK_LOANS l ON ba.LOAN_NO=l.LOAN_NO JOIN REAL_BOOK r ON l.REAL_BOOK=r.REAL_BOOK JOIN BOOKS b ON b.BOOK_NO=r.BOOK_NO ORDER BY 8
